mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review values ( rev_seq.nextval, #{acc_seq}, #{rev_sysname}, #{rev_star}, #{rev_content}, #{store_seq}, #{order_seq}, sysdate, null, default )
mapper.select: SELECT R.REV_SEQ, --리뷰번호 R.STORE_SEQ, --식당번호(참조용) (SELECT STORE_NAME FROM STORE WHERE STORE_SEQ = R.STORE_SEQ) AS STORE_NAME, -- 식당이름 R.REV_STAR, --별점 R.REV_CONTENT, --리뷰 내용 R.REV_SYSNAME, --리뷰 사진 R.ORDER_SEQ, --주문번호 (메뉴리스트 참조용) O.MENU_LIST, --메뉴리스트 TO_CHAR(R.rev_writedate,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REV_WRITETIME, --리뷰 작성시간 (수정시간) CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(R.rev_writedate + NUMTODSINTERVAL(3,'day'), 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS.FF' ) > TO_CHAR(SYSTIMESTAMP,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS.FF') THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END FLAG_UDT FROM REVIEW R INNER JOIN ORDERS O ON( R.ORDER_SEQ = O.ORDER_SEQ ) WHERE R.ACC_SEQ = #{myReviewDTO.acc_seq} ORDER BY WRITE_TIME DESC
